posts.post_content:
More T206s FS - see scans, prices include delivery - PayPal (gift if possible, please), check or MO.  Email or PM.

T206 Barney Pelty (Vertical), SGC50, Piedmont 350 - $45**SOLD**
T206 Nick Maddox, SCG30, PB (dead centered - I don't see any creases, looks like a very small mark above his cap) - $25 **SOLD**
T206 Charley O'Leary, SGC40, SC Overprint - (clean, dead centered) $40 **SOLD**  Thanks Jantz
T206 Pryor McLeveen, SGC40, Piedmont 350 - $30 **SOLD**
T206 Simon Nicholls (hands at knees), SGC30, Piedmont 150 - $25 **SOLD**
T206 Peter O'Brien, GAI3, SOV 350 - $40
T206 Fred Parent, PSA1, Piedmont 150 (great front, 2 small paper loss on back) - $20 **SOLD**
T206 Bill O'Hara, PSA1, Piedmont 350 (crease) - $25

Thank you, as always for looking!

Hi Ed,

I will take the O'Leary if it is still available. Let me know.

Thanks,

Jantz
Prices lowered (noted in BLUE CAPS) on the remaining
